title: Taliban Bar Women From NGOs, Threatening to Worsen Crisis
description: A letter from Afghanistan’s Ministry of Economy warned that it would revoke the operating licenses of any organizations that defied the decree.

title: Fuel Tanker Wedged in Overpass Explodes Near Hospital in South Africa
description: At least nine people were killed and 60 injured from the ensuing fireball, in a scene a witness described as a “zombie apocalypse.”

title: Indigenous Communities in Canada Still Await Safe Drinking Water
description: A legal victory last December raised hopes for an accelerated path to clean drinking water on Canadian reserves. But for many, the wait drags on.

title: Storm Batters Canada, Leaving Thousands Without Power
description: Even Canadians accustomed to the vagaries of Arctic weather systems contended with a long list of extremes, including cold that “freezes flesh in minutes.”

title: Your Favorite Things of 2022
description: This week, your best highly specific best-ofs of the year.

title: Russia Shells Kherson, Killing 5 as Zelensky Warns More Strikes Could Mar Christmas
description: Ukraine’s leader had urged vigilance after the military noted the presence of Russian ships carrying cruise missiles in the Black Sea.

title: The Syrian Family That Rebuilt a Chocolate Empire in Nova Scotia
description: Seven years on, Peace by Chocolate continues to expand, and its founder has become an advocate of more open immigration.

title: The Syrian Family That Rebuilt a Chocolate Empire in Nova Scotia
description: Seven years on, Peace by Chocolate continues to expand, and its founder has become an advocate of more open immigration.

title: Putin Wants Fealty, and He’s Found It in Africa
description: The Russian president has unleashed a new disorder on the world with his war in Ukraine, and the Central African Republic may be its ultimate expression.

title: Lonely, Single and Over 50? China Has a Game Show for That.
description: Several popular television programs in the country are helping to encourage conversations about the social, romantic and sexual needs of older Chinese people.

title: A Christmas Tree Brings Life to a Destroyed Palestinian Village
description: For former residents of Iqrit, where Israeli forces leveled everything but the church in 1951, religious rituals bind them to a place from which they were expelled.
